TopicTitle: Apollo Mission Pack Development (Beta version released!)

Articles.Content:
Try Frizank.

Excellent suggestion. Also maybe MrTheBull? I know he's working an Apollo CM/S, but don't think he is doing the LM. Hate to see all your hard work die on the vine.
Not only MrTheBull! I almost made my Saturn-Apollo and, most likely, it will be my first addon

Finish the zenit first

I remember that you asked me to finish the Zenith, but I reinstalled on a laptop, and my work has been removed, I will do it again.

Excellent suggestion. Also maybe MrTheBull? I know he's working an Apollo CM/S, but don't think he is doing the LM. Hate to see all your hard work die on the vine.

I already suggested MrTheBull to take over this scince AMP is the most developed Apollo mod currently but most possibly he is going to make only the CSM. Lovad (World Space mod) is working on the CSM/LM for his Saturn V.
If this project ever decides to have an AGC then I could write one in KOS...

I already suggested MrTheBull to take over this scince AMP is the most developed Apollo mod currently but most possibly he is going to make only the CSM. Lovad (World Space mod) is working on the CSM/LM for his Saturn V.

Well, as I said, I'm currently redoing the ISS, so I really don't have much time to do anything else.
